project.name: Project
project.doc: Represents a project that may be deployed or updated

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this project

props.name: rootPath
props.doc: Path to the directory that contains this project
Time when this project was introduced
Time whe this project was removed / archived

library.name: VersionedModule
library.doc: Represents a library module which may be exported or added as a dependency to another project

props.doc: Id of the project this module is part of

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this module

props.name: relativeChangeListPath
props.doc: A path relative to the project root directory, which points to this module's Changes.md file

props.name: relativeArtifactDirectory
props.doc: A path relative to the project root directory, which points to the directory where artifact jar files will be exported
Time when this module was introduced
Time when this module was archived or removed

library.name: DocSection
library.doc: Represents section within a documentation (md) file

props.name: parentSectionId
props.doc: Id of the section which contains this section. None if this is the root level section.

props.name: header
props.doc: Header text for this section

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: A 0-based index which determines this section's location within the parent section

library.name: SubSectionLink
library.doc: Represents a link between two doc sections, assigning one as the subsection of another

props.name: parentId
props.doc: Id of the parent section, which contains the child section

props.name: childId
props.doc: Id of the section contained within the parent section

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: A 0-based index determining the location of the subsection within the parent section

library.name: DocLine
library.doc: Represents a single line of text within a documentation

props.name: sectionId
props.doc: Id of the section within which this line belongs

props.name: text
props.doc: Text content of this line

props.name: indentation
props.doc: Number of tabs / indents at the beginning of this line

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: 0-based index determining this line's position in its section

library.name: ModuleRelease
library.doc: Represents a published version / build of a versioned module

props.name: moduleId
props.doc: Id of the released module

props.name: version
props.doc: Released version

props.name: docId
props.doc: Id of the documentation of this release. None if there is no documentation specific to this version.

deployment.name: ProjectDeploymentConfig
deployment.doc: Represents settings used for deploying a project

props.doc: Id of the project which this configuration describes

props.name: outputDirectory
props.doc: Directory to which all the deployed files / sub-directories will be placed

props.name: relativeInputDirectory
props.doc: Path relative to this project's root directory which contains all deployed files
Time when this configuration was added
Time when this configuration was replaced with another

props.name: usesBuildDirectories
props.doc: Whether this project places deployed files in separate build directories

props.name: fileDeletionEnabled
props.doc: Whether output files not present in the input directories should be automatically removed

deployment.name: Binding
deployment.doc: Represents a binding between an input directory/file and an output directory/file

props.name: configId
props.doc: Id of the configuration this binding belongs to

props.name: source
props.doc: Path to the file or directory that is being deployed. May be relative.

props.name: target
props.doc: Path to the directory or file where the 'source' is copied

deployment.name: Branch
deployment.doc: Represents a versioned branch of a project

props.doc: Id of the project this branch / version is part of

props.name: name
props.doc: Name of this branch
Time when this branch was introduced
Time when this branch was removed

props.name: isDefault
props.doc: Whether this is the default branch of the associated project

deployment.name: Deployment
deployment.doc: Represents an event where a project is deployed

props.doc: Id of the branch that was deployed
Time when this deployment was made

props.name: version
props.doc: Deployed project version. None if versioning is not being used.
